kpi.name: M1034C4

kpi_info.title: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR CS CALL DCH DL PER OPER
kpi_info.use: The amount of MAC-d PDU data transferred in the CS Call DCH in the downlink direction during the measurement interval. UPDATED: The counter is updated at 20-second intervals, and when the connection is released or the active set is changed.

kpi.kpi_alias: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR CS CALL DCH DL PER OPER
